title: Forecasting BRL price
description: Machine learning project for forecasting Brazilian Real to USD exchange rates with time series analysis, benchmarking an LSTM and ARIMA models.

title: Low-Rank Transformations of the Syntactic-Semantic Space in Multiple Natural Language Tasks
description: Evaluated LoRA-multi for parameter-efficient fine-tuning of Transformer models (BERT, DistilBERT) across NLP tasks using HuggingFace's PEFT library and X-LoRA for Mixture-of-Expert strategy.

title: Fairness in Medium-Scale Language Models
description: Analyzed gender fairness and social biases in medium-scale language models using Python, Hugging Face Transformers, and Matplotlib.

title: Genetic Algorithm for NBA Game Predictions
description: Designed an NBA game prediction model using a genetic algorithm for feature optimization, implemented in Python with NumPy and Pandas.

title: NLP with Disaster Tweets
description: Developed and benchmarked ML models for NLP Disaster Tweets Kaggle challenge, including Logistic Regression, Naive Bayes, and fine-tuned DistilBERT with LoRA (79.7% accuracy), using Scikit-learn, Hugging Face Transformers, and Matplotlib.

title: Reliable Waitlist API
description: Developed a real-time waitlist management system with dynamic priority adjustment and penalty system using FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, and Docker.
